subject: Box one repaired
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Even the very first box had manual mode--not sure why I included that on the
first one, we were unaware that manual sweep could be used until about 2008.
Thre was no provision for the monitor speaker, as the cabinet, or lack there
of was just the main board mounted on top of the echo chamber.

F-S
